author: Danny Jedi
comment: interface is lacking, also didn't work after the first face was created, failed a few times to send to watch and experience is extremely underwhelming. But this app is exciting, when they get it right it'll be a huge success - until then, I'd wait for updates.

author: Allen Matthews
comment: Incredible selection of distinct, clean designs. Watch three "how to" video to install properly. Not perfect, when trying to customize beyond designers faces... Sometimes it's not recognized by my Asus Zenwatch 2.
title: Really adds HQ watch faces

author: John copper
comment: Made my own face;(syfi theme); which is now my favorite.... wish there were more items to add, like adding a compass or other things. Enjoy your cup of java....
title: Easy learning curve

author: Christopher Smith
comment: Only just getting into customising my west faces and so far this is really good. Sometimes a little laggy but overall it works very well. Would recommend...
title: Good app

author: John Hipkiss
comment: Very nice app. There are literally hundreds of watch faces you can choose from but if you can't find one you like use this instead. You can choose any image and have it as a watch face.
title: Designer

author: M Witkowski
comment: I wish the photos added for hands would auto size. I am not sure how I can resize pics on my phone for this app. And now that the wrong size pics are used, I cant take them off. Need a reset button. Im stuck with my photos for hour/min/seconds taking up full screen on watch...help please. I did donate :)
title: Can't seem to do all on my phone

author: Eric DuMond
comment: I downloaded this expecting a few decent watch faces, but I was wrong. This is a great watch app that allows you to customize the watch face to make it uniquely your own. The artists that contribute to this are all great!!
title: Great app!

author: Nathan Grimes
comment: This app is really good if you want to put a custom photos as your watch face. The only thing is you have to find some good hour/min hands from Google. You can add a digital clock but i Wish there was a way to select "no watch hands"
title: It's good

author: Josh Cruz
comment: But it's hard as hell to make your own face to move a digital watch it's on an x and y enter the percentage code and if you mess it up there's no return to default option
title: It's good

author: Tom Gray
comment: Everything works great! Wish making custom faces would be a little easier, but finding pre-made ones is easy. I'll be sending a coffee your way good sir.
title: Fantastic!

author: Jeffrey Houston
comment: The app took a little tinkering with, but I am please with the end result.
title: My own personal Motor 360

author: Taylor Pratt
comment: This app is great. It just takes a bit to figure out. It would be nice if you could edit the images you are using for the clock hands and a reset to default button. I had to download 2 different apps to make the clock hands.(instasize and a .png creator called background eraser). All in all I now have a watch face that I didn't have before. And it's awesome. Thanks.
title: Works well

author: Mike Meyer
comment: Great for doing dumb watch faces. Worthless if you actually want your smart watch to act like a smart device.

author: chris hickson
comment: Nice watch faces. Not lots to choose from, but the ones available look great.

author: Dan Cazacu
comment: I find alot of watchfaces, none i like has dim mode. 7even would have been awesome ..
title: Lots of faces, few with dim mode.

author: NR inside
comment: Very good but it can only load faces from only one website.  When I try to import watchfaces from other sources it won't load them..  But very good overall
title: LG G WATCH

author: Steane Blanch
comment: Needs some work and the rare crash is frustrating but otherwise good to use.
title: Plenty of options

author: Martin Hosking
comment: Thanks very much for your support today Albrecht. I now have this fantastic app working fine on my S6 and Smartwatch 3, super fast and helpful support.
title: Fantastic app. Even better support.

author: Dennis Bareis
comment: Not as good as (and certainly less capable than) WatchMaker
title: Way to simplistic for me...

author: Vince Tetuan III
comment: I think I need to play with this some more.... but I think this could be more user friendly.  But I'm not an app developer. Give me a couple of days, and I will put an addendum.
title: Seems cool

author: Antione Lightbourn
comment: Create the perfect watch background and markers on watchmaker (free)... then export the watch/picture to yourself (i.e. your email). Save it. Use it with this app :)
title: Useful hint.

author: Steve Marsh
comment: Better if could remove one clock for another. The digital and analog clock show on the same face. Changed the images for the min and sec very cool.
title: Awesome

author: Tsukeman
comment: Really nice design, easy to use, and you can even edit already existing watch faces made by others to fit your needs!
title: Fantastic

author: Brandon Ogg
comment: The app on my phone continues to crash :(
title: Booooo

author: Ryan Dwyer
comment: Intuitive interface, creative yet simple.  Outstanding functional art for your day to day living...  would love to see more packs though
title: Perfect

author: Awais Tariq
comment: Loved it only thing missing is to have your own library to browse through it in the app and not to export it every time
title: Loved it

author: Charlie Forrester
comment: No watch face
title: Doesn't work

author: Dia Agha
comment: I had put a picture and works fine except my ok google doesn't seem to work but I can live without

author: D M Sled/G\e
comment: Doesn't work on my ZenWatch. Works fine on my G Watch but it will not load on the Zen Watch

reply.author: UhrArt
reply.content: Sad to hear that. Does your ZenWatch has at least Android Version 5.0. Please contact me under issues@uhrart.com and we'll figure out what's wrong.

title: Why

author: Anthony Williams
comment: This is the only app where I have found GOT watch faces and been able to download them!
title: Game Of Thrones

author: Joker K
comment: Does not connect to my watch
title: Doesn't work

author: muhd zahiruddin
comment: Great I've been finding this from the time i get my watch and its free not like others app
title: Nicee

author: Flaviu Iordan
comment: It only comea with one face which i like, but i downloaded few more. Very customizable ;)
title: I really like it

author: Adam Neeworth
comment: I would rate 5 stars if you can make the pear wearface interactive
title: It's alright

author: Nitiyudo Mochdie
comment: Many watch faces to choose with a great design. Love it. Keep the good work :)
title: Like it very much!

author: Tajanator
comment: Not very user friendly..

author: Kishore Babani
comment: This app is ridiculously the best thing I have ever used.
title: Excellent

author: Jim Edmiston
comment: Had my moto 360  a few hours and already  figured out how to use this app and get some really nice faces. Thanks!

author: Mathew Smart
comment: Could be improved a little on the ui side, but a good app none the less
title: Its not bad

author: Karran Sahadeo
comment: Cut and dry app which is very easy and straight forward to import pre-made and custom designs
title: Excellent
